cms.query.QueryText: SELECT COM_OrderItem.*, COM_OrderItemSKUFile.Token, COM_SKUFile.FileName, COM_SKU.SKUProductType, COM_Order.OrderSiteID, COM_Customer.CustomerID, COM_Customer.CustomerEmail FROM COM_OrderItem JOIN COM_OrderItemSKUFile ON COM_OrderItemSKUFile.OrderItemID = COM_OrderItem.OrderItemID JOIN COM_SKUFile ON COM_SKUFile.FileID = COM_OrderItemSKUFile.FileID JOIN COM_SKU ON COM_SKU.SKUID = COM_OrderItem.OrderItemSKUID JOIN COM_Order ON COM_Order.OrderID = COM_OrderItem.OrderItemOrderID JOIN COM_Customer ON COM_Customer.CustomerID = COM_Order.OrderCustomerID WHERE ((DATEDIFF(day, @CurrentDateTime, COM_OrderItem.OrderItemValidTo) BETWEEN 0 AND @Days) AND ((@OnlyWithSendNotification = 0) OR (COM_OrderItem.OrderItemSendNotification = 1)) AND ((@SiteID = 0) OR (COM_Order.OrderSiteID = @SiteID)) AND (##WHERE##)) ORDER BY (##ORDERBY##)
